senses.sense_definition: An alternative form of <w>tromp</w>, a water-powered air-blowing device used in a forge.

examples.text: The ancient ironworks utilized a large <w>trompe</w> to provide a continuous blast of air.
Engineers studied the historical design of the <w>trompe</w> to understand early pneumatic systems.

senses.sense_definition: A trumpet or a similar wind instrument.

examples.text: The herald raised his <w>trompe</w> to announce the arrival of the royal procession.
In the medieval manuscript, the musician is depicted playing a brass <w>trompe</w>.
